name: Bomb's Lair
description:
Deep within the Bomb's Lair, there is said to be held a highly regarded treasure!

Only problem is, it's filled with low-tempered bombs...

Can you conquer the lair, and get past the unstable bombs?

Good luck!

If you hear "scratchy" noises from the game, it's an issue with the HTML5 export from Godot. Download the zip for best sound quality!
